attributes.action: Adopt a policy, which delays foreign investors from bulk buying houses in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
“In 2011 there were 1.1 million household spaces unoccupied by usual residents, up from 0.9 million in 2001 (a 21 per cent rise).” 

Source: http://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/politics/more-than-a-million-homes-currently-lie-empty-in-britain-9456263.html

http://www.theguardian.com/uk-news/2015/jan/25/its-like-a-ghost-town-lights-go-out-as-foreign-owners-desert-london-homes
attributes.background: One of the main reasons for our current housing crisis are empty homes which were bought as investment assets, thus we should adopt a policy which prevents foreign investors and immigrants from buying more than one residential property, unless they have been UK residents for more than 3 years.
